content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron-plate.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper-plate.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, researching automation.
- ElectricityGroup (id 30932) connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) used for electricity production; warnings include "not connected to power network", "no input liquid" and "no fluid present in connections".
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; warning "out of fuel"; contains ≈190 units of water at 15°C; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); now linked to fluid_system [168867].
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water intake; status WORKING.
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) for manual fuel feeding.
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
   • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 168867, status WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 168866, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system = 168879, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system = 168878, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 168874, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system = 168883, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 168882, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 168885, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 168886, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system = 168887, status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Pipeline Connection and Fluid System Failures:
  - Multiple connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system identifiers [165547, 165631, 165713, 165797, 165879, 165963, 166045, 166129, 166211, 166295, 166377, 166461, 166543, 166627, 166709, 166793, 166875, 167041, 167125, 167207, 167291, 167373, 167457, 168203, 168287, 168369, 168453, 168535, 168619, 168701, 168785] returned zero candidate pipe groups near Position(-5.5, 19.5).
  - Tip: Verify that each fluid_system identifier is valid in the current map state and ensure candidate pipe groups exist at or near the targeted location before initiating connection attempts.

• Inadequate Candidate Search Radius:
  - All pipeline connection searches within a 15-tile radius of Position(-5.5, 19.5) have consistently returned no candidate pipe groups.
  - Tip: Adjust the search radius or revalidate spatial parameters to ensure that candidate pipe groups are within the effective connection area.
